quote: Jesse’s brewed an exotic blend of New York jazz stories and world music from klezmer melodies to **afrobeat** grooves – an intriguingly personal gumbo.

quotes.quote: Jesse’s brewed an exotic blend of New York jazz stories and world music from klezmer melodies to afrobeat grooves – **an intriguingly personal gumbo.**
*Day Dreamer* is a culmination of \[Jesse’s] unwavering pursuit of capturing the magical groove in a soul/funk jazz atmosphere … **Highly Recommended**!
